author: Megan Armstrong
title: Ex-Maryland OL Ellis McKennie III's Dad out of Hospital After COVID-19 Diagnosis
description: Former Maryland offensive lineman Ellis McKennie III had plenty to celebrate on Monday as his father was released from the hospital after "close to a month in the hospital" battling COVID-19:         " This is hope...
content:
